articles.author: Sagar Dua
articles.title: Gold rally loses steam on firm speculation for Fed delying rate cuts - FXStreet
articles.description: Gold price (XAU/USD) drops after facing selling pressure near the crucial resistance of $2,400 in Tuesday’s early American session.
articles.content:
• Gold price falls as receding Fed rate cut hopes limit demand.
  • Strong US Retail Sales fuel uncertainty over the timing of the Fed interest-rate cuts.
